sentences.sContent: Many of the industrialized economies would be pushed into a cycle of stagflation.
sentences.sCn: 许多工业化经济将被推入到一个滞胀的循环中。

trans.tranCn: [经] 滞胀，不景气状况下之物价上涨
trans.tranOther: If an economy is suffering from stagflation, inflation is high but there is no increase in the demand for goods or in the number of people who have jobs
